description: Combining the comfort of your favorite sweatpants with high-tech, trail-tough performance, the Radikl® is built for action. Strategically placed knit panels offer unparalleled flexibility and highly breathable comfort. Lightweight, and incredibly durable, the Radikl® features ultra-tough abrasion resistance and superior (UPF 50+) sun protection for extended outdoor adventure.
name: Kuhl Radikl Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Enduro Fabric - 68% Cotton, 29% Nylon, 3% Spandex - 176 g
two front hand, one coin, two back, one stealth cell phone and one 3D pocket
